cab.content: This Document is the Property ofHis Britannic MsjQsty'3 GovernmentsecretDIRJECTOPi-TE OF MMj&KgOg (Homo Office)Scotland House, 3.VM. 3rd January, 1921.racial ksport(Circulated hy the Home Secretary)On the evening of the 2nd a number of men were seen loitering near a large grain warehouse in SALPORD,They were suspected of incendiarism and when a constablequestioned two of them they fired upon him, wounding himdangerously, and escaped. The names of the assailantsare believed to he JAkES WARDHAM or WARSHAM andJAMS3 DOR0. These two and four other Irishmen arebeing detained under Regulation 55 of the Defence of the realm Regulations.
